subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: It has been anything but easy in the past year, even in the past week, for Kim Clijsters to put herself in position to have the farewell season brimming with meaning that she hopes she deserves.
snippet: It has been anything but easy in the past year, even in the past week, for Kim Clijsters to put herself in position to have the farewell season brimming with meaning that she hopes she deserves.
